des:
This skill allows you to manage your Devex Systems thermostats. You can now modify setpoint, heating modes and get the current temperature from your voice.

In order to control your Devex Systems, you need to create an account and pair your device with Devex Systems app.
- Download and open Devex Systems app on your smartphone, Android or IOS ;
- Create an account and login ;
- Pair your thermostats with "+" icons on main menu, and follow installation steps ;
- As soon as your Devex Systems appear on your apps, your device is ready to pair with Alexa ;
- Activate the skill on Alexa app and login with the same credentials used in Devex Systems app ;
- After login, Alexa App asks you if you want to search new devices, press yes.

Your devices will now appear as thermostat on Alexa app !
You will be able to configure them in a room and control them directly with your voice.
For example, ask current room temperature :
"Alexa, what is the temperature in my bathroom ?"

Devex Systems give you 3 different heating modes: AUTOMATIC, HEAT, OFF. You can set a mode with:
"Alexa, set bathroom to OFF"

You can also adjust thermostat setpoint :
"Alexa, set bathroom to 23 degrees"

This skill is created to improve your experience with your connected thermostat Devex Systems. 
Let's control them with your voice !
